sentences.en: Bizarre thoughts, weird visions, and strange voices perplexed and terrified her.
sentences.cn: 数不尽的离奇念头, 光怪陆离的幻象, 奇异的声响,一齐向她袭来,使她感到恐惧.

sentences.en: Fantasies cannot harm you, no matter how bizarre or far out they are.
sentences.cn: 无论幻想多么怪诞、多么离谱，都不能造成伤害。

sentences.en: He tends to write bizarre and highly experimental pieces of music.
sentences.cn: 他倾向于创作高度试验性而且风格奇异的音乐作品。

sentences.en: His fast-paced novels are full of bizarre situations and madcap antics.
sentences.cn: 他那些快节奏的小说里充满了怪诞的场景和荒唐的行为。

sentences.en: His remarks at the swearing - in ranged from the perfunctory to the bizarre.
sentences.cn: 他在宣誓仪式上的讲话敷衍赛责,古里古怪.

sentences.en: Suddenly all of the bizarre and seemingly isolated examples took on a meaningful focus.
sentences.cn: 突然之间，所有那些怪异且看上去孤立的例子都具有了意义。

sentences.en: The album is a bizarre agglomeration of styles.
sentences.cn: 这张专辑不同寻常地集各种风格于一体。

sentences.en: The allegations ranged from the banal to the bizarre.
sentences.cn: 从平淡无奇到离奇百怪的各种说法都有。

sentences.en: the bizarre convolutions of the story
sentences.cn: 那故事错综复杂的离奇情节

sentences.en: The building was of bizarre construction.
The game was also notable for the bizarre behaviour of the team's manager.
sentences.cn: 这场比赛也因球队主教练怪异的举动而尽人皆知。

sentences.en: The referee took centre stage as 11 players were booked and one sent off in a bizarre game.
sentences.cn: 在一次离奇的比赛中，裁判给11名队员记名警告，把一名队员罚下场，成了全场关注的焦点。

sentences.en: The story has a certain bizarre interest.
sentences.cn: 这个故事听起来别有风趣.

sentences.en: We accept the right of all men and women to do their own thing, however bizarre.
sentences.cn: 我们承认所有人——无论男女——都有权以自己的方式去生活，不管其方式有多么怪异离奇。

words.tran_cn: 奇异的（指态度，容貌，款式等）
